department.ch: 土木工程學系營建管理碩士班
department.en: Master‘s Program in Construction Management, Department of Civil Engineering

goal.ch:
因應組織及業務的日趨複雜，個人及事業常須藉由專案管理以達成任務，本課程將介紹專案/計畫(Project)的整合(Integration)與範疇(Scope)管理技能，案例部份將特別著重工程技術領域相關之取材；專案管理(Project Management, PM)內容包括PM所需領域知識(Domain Knowledge)及管理作業流程(Process)概念，學員可透過教師課堂講解及參與討論，瞭解當代專案管理之理論及應用實務。
1.培養學生專案整合之知識與能力。
2.培養學生範疇管理之知識與能力。
3.透過案例研討，培養學生專案規劃之能力及對永續工程之瞭解。
4.經由學期報告培養學生上台報告及撰寫報告之能力。
goal.en:
1.Cultivate students’s project integration capabilities.
2.Cultivate students’ project scope management capabilities.
3.Through case studies, cultivate students’ capabilities on project planning and improve their knowledge on sustainable engineering.
4.Improve students’oral and written skills through their case presentation.

outline.ch:
1.專案管理基本概念
2.專業與社會責任
3.組織影響與專案生命週期
4.專案管理流程
5.整合管理
6.範疇管理
7.整合範疇管理之技術應用
8.整合範疇管理之契約探討
9.工程專案實務參訪/分組討論
10.期末報告評量
outline.en:
1.Introduction
2.PMI ＆ PMP - Ethics
3.Organizational Influences and Project Life Cycle
4.Project Management Processes
5.PMBOK：(Integration)
6.PMBOK：(Scope)
7.Technology Application
8.Contract Evaluation
9.Site Visit/Group Discussion
10.Project Report

textbook.ch: A Guide to the Project Management Body of Knowledge (PMBOK Guide- 5th Ed.)Project Management Institute, (2013) (或類似教材)及參考資料(隨課提供)。
textbook.en: A Guide to the Project Management Body of Knowledge (PMBOK Guide- 5th Ed.)Project Management Institute, (2013) Similar teaching materials and reference materials might be provided with class.
